events.name: Diplomatic Expulsions Between Canada and India
events.wd_label: Diplomatic Expulsions Between Canada and India
events.wd_description: Canada and India have engaged in tit-for-tat diplomatic expulsions following allegations by Canadian Prime Minister Justin Trudeau that India was involved in a state-sponsored assassination on Canadian soil.
events.description: Canada and India have engaged in tit-for-tat diplomatic expulsions following allegations by Canadian Prime Minister Justin Trudeau that India was involved in a state-sponsored assassination on Canadian soil.

events.name: Trudeau's Allegations
events.wd_description: Canadian Prime Minister Justin Trudeau alleged that India was involved in the assassination of Sikh independence advocate Hardeep Singh Niijar in Surrey, British Columbia in June.
events.description: Canadian Prime Minister Justin Trudeau alleged that India was involved in the assassination of Sikh independence advocate Hardeep Singh Niijar in Surrey, British Columbia in June.

events.name: Canada's Diplomatic Expulsion
events.wd_description: Canada expelled Pavan Kumar Rai, the most senior member of India’s foreign intelligence agency operating in Canada.
events.description: Canada expelled Pavan Kumar Rai, the most senior member of India’s foreign intelligence agency operating in Canada.

events.name: India's Retaliation
events.wd_description: India retaliated by ordering a senior Canadian diplomat to leave the country within five days.
events.description: India retaliated by ordering a senior Canadian diplomat to leave the country within five days.

events.name: International Response
events.wd_description: British Foreign Secretary James Cleverly expressed support for Canada’s investigation and expects India to cooperate.
events.description: British Foreign Secretary James Cleverly expressed support for Canada’s investigation and expects India to cooperate.

events.name: Turkey Backs Sweden's NATO Bid
events.wd_description: Turkey has agreed to support Sweden’s bid to join NATO, ending over a year of opposition and paving the way for Sweden’s accession to the military alliance.
events.description: Turkey has agreed to support Sweden’s bid to join NATO, ending over a year of opposition and paving the way for Sweden’s accession to the military alliance.

events.name: Turkey's Agreement
events.wd_description: Turkish President Recep Tayyip Erdogan has agreed to back Sweden's NATO bid and to move the accession protocol for Sweden to the Grand National Assembly as soon as possible.
events.description: Turkish President Recep Tayyip Erdogan has agreed to back Sweden's NATO bid and to move the accession protocol for Sweden to the Grand National Assembly as soon as possible.

events.name: NATO Chief's Announcement
events.wd_description: NATO Chief Jens Stoltenberg announced that Turkey had agreed to support Sweden's NATO membership.
events.description: NATO Chief Jens Stoltenberg announced that Turkey had agreed to support Sweden's NATO membership.

events.name: Turkey's Condition on EU Membership
events.wd_description: Erdogan stated that Sweden could only join NATO after Turkey is accepted into the European Union.
events.description: Erdogan stated that Sweden could only join NATO after Turkey is accepted into the European Union.

events.name: Record-breaking rainfall and flooding in Hong Kong
events.wd_label: Record-breaking rainfall and flooding in Hong Kong
events.wd_description: Hong Kong experienced record-breaking rainfall of 158.1 mm in a single hour, leading to widespread flooding and disruptions in train and road traffic.
events.description: Hong Kong experienced record-breaking rainfall of 158.1 mm in a single hour, leading to widespread flooding and disruptions in train and road traffic.

events.name: Record rainfall
events.wd_description: The most rainfall ever recorded in Hong Kong, 158.1 mm in a single hour, occurred on Thursday night, setting a new record since records began in 1884.
events.description: The most rainfall ever recorded in Hong Kong, 158.1 mm in a single hour, occurred on Thursday night, setting a new record since records began in 1884.

events.name: Train and road disruptions
events.wd_description: Flooding caused by the record rainfall led to temporary halts in train services, particularly in the Wong Tai Sin neighborhood, and affected other stations as well.
events.description: Flooding caused by the record rainfall led to temporary halts in train services, particularly in the Wong Tai Sin neighborhood, and affected other stations as well.

events.name: Flooding risk in northern Hong Kong
events.wd_label: Flooding risk in northern Hong Kong
events.wd_description: Hong Kong officials prepared to release water from reservoirs, which could lead to additional flooding in northern parts of the city.
events.description: Hong Kong officials prepared to release water from reservoirs, which could lead to additional flooding in northern parts of the city.

events.name: U.S. Scrutiny on EV Batteries and Car Parts
events.wd_label: U.S. Scrutiny on EV Batteries and Car Parts
events.wd_description: Washington's efforts to eliminate U.S. links to forced labor in Chinese supply chains have expanded to include electric-vehicle batteries and other car parts.
events.description: Washington's efforts to eliminate U.S. links to forced labor in Chinese supply chains have expanded to include electric-vehicle batteries and other car parts.

events.name: Uyghur Forced Labor Prevention Act (UFLPA) Enforcement
events.wd_label: Uyghur Forced Labor Prevention Act (UFLPA) Enforcement
events.wd_description: Enforcement of UFLPA has expanded from focusing on solar panels, tomatoes, and cotton apparel to now include batteries, tires, aluminum, and steel.
events.description: Enforcement of UFLPA has expanded from focusing on solar panels, tomatoes, and cotton apparel to now include batteries, tires, aluminum, and steel.

events.name: t: Initial Focus Areas
events.wd_description: UFLPA initially focused on solar panels, tomatoes, and cotton apparel to curb forced labor in Xinjiang, China.
events.description: UFLPA initially focused on solar panels, tomatoes, and cotton apparel to curb forced labor in Xinjiang, China.

events.name: t: Expanded Focus Areas
events.wd_description: The focus has expanded to include lithium-ion batteries, tires, aluminum, and steel, reflecting increased scrutiny on automotive imports.
events.description: The focus has expanded to include lithium-ion batteries, tires, aluminum, and steel, reflecting increased scrutiny on automotive imports.

events.name: Impact on Automotive Supply Chains
events.wd_description: Increased inspections and detentions of automotive components at U.S. borders could disrupt automakers who need to ensure their supply chains are free of forced labor.
events.description: Increased inspections and detentions of automotive components at U.S. borders could disrupt automakers who need to ensure their supply chains are free of forced labor.

events.name: t: Detentions and Disruptions
events.wd_description: U.S. Customs and Border Protection (CBP) has detained shipments of automotive and aerospace parts, signaling potential disruptions for automakers.
events.description: U.S. Customs and Border Protection (CBP) has detained shipments of automotive and aerospace parts, signaling potential disruptions for automakers.

events.name: t: Industry Reactions
events.wd_description: Automakers are on alert and are increasing their due diligence to ensure their supply chains are free of forced labor.
events.description: Automakers are on alert and are increasing their due diligence to ensure their supply chains are free of forced labor.

events.name: UFLPA's Broader Impact
events.wd_description: The Uyghur Forced Labor Prevention Act (UFLPA) has significantly impacted industries critical to the Biden administration’s climate goals.
events.description: The Uyghur Forced Labor Prevention Act (UFLPA) has significantly impacted industries critical to the Biden administration’s climate goals.

events.name: Impact on Solar Energy
events.wd_description: Enforcement of UFLPA has led to the detention of solar panels, stalling the development of solar energy projects in the U.S.
events.description: Enforcement of UFLPA has led to the detention of solar panels, stalling the development of solar energy projects in the U.S.

events.name: Potential Impact on EV Industry
events.wd_description: Similar enforcement actions on automotive components could disrupt the supply chains for electric vehicles, which are critical for reducing fossil fuel dependency and combating climate change.
events.description: Similar enforcement actions on automotive components could disrupt the supply chains for electric vehicles, which are critical for reducing fossil fuel dependency and combating climate change.
